sentences.en: Carotenes are insoluble in water and soluble in oils and fats.
sentences.cn: 胡萝卜素不溶于水，但可溶于油类和脂肪。

sentences.en: Cupric azide is insoluble in water.
Graphite and even its linear counterpart, poly ( p - phenylene ) are too insoluble.
sentences.cn: 石墨甚至其线性类似物, 聚 ( 名聚-苯撑 ) 都是极难溶解的.

sentences.en: Graphite and even its liner counterpart , poly ( p - phenylene ) are too insoluble.
sentences.cn: 石墨甚至其线性类似物聚苯,极不易溶解.

sentences.en: I pushed the problem aside; at present it was insoluble.
sentences.cn: 我把问题抛在一边，目前它还无法解决。
部门内难以调和的冲突

sentences.en: It is insoluble in carbon disulphide, soluble in hot aniline and phenol.
sentences.cn: 它不溶于二硫化碳, 溶于热苯胺和苯酚.

sentences.en: It was an insoluble dilemma and one which I could do nothing about.
sentences.cn: 那是个无法解决的两难局面，我无计可施。

sentences.en: Lungs retain relatively insoluble particulate material.
sentences.cn: 肺脏内留有不溶解的颗粒物质.

sentences.en: On entering a shop, he would ask for a new perfume called'Scented Shadow'or for'insoluble bath cubes '.
sentences.cn: 他一走进商店, 便要买一种名叫 “ 香味影子 ” 的新香水,或者要买非溶性浴皂.
聚丙烯腈不溶于丙烯腈.
聚氯乙烯不溶于氯乙烯.

sentences.en: The metal ion and the anion of the mineral acid form an insoluble salt.
sentences.cn: 金属离子和无机酸的阴离子生成一种难溶的盐.

sentences.en: These chemicals are practically insoluble in water.
sentences.cn: 这些化学物质几乎不溶于水.

sentences.en: Would you expect this substance to be hard and insoluble in most liquids?
sentences.cn: 你是否认为这种物质会很硬,并且不溶于大多数液体中?

words.tran_cn: 不能解决的；不能溶解的

trans.tran_en: an insoluble problem is or seems impossible to solve
